Reference

All functions

AIC_avg()

Run AIC Model Averaging on a Model

avgm_res()

Diagnostic Plots and Residual Determination

avg_predict()

Predict for an Averaged Model

beta.pair_geo()

Pairwise Community Dissimilarity between Geogrphical Units

clade_age()

Calculate the crown age of clades

clade_area()

Area of Geographic Feature Occupancy

com_matrix()

Create a list of community matrices

curv_boot()

Run Constant Age or Size Bootstrapping

div_db_ids()

Retrieve COL and other database IDs

EE_compile()

Compile data from different files exported by Earth Engine

Factorize()

Turn Categorical Columns of a Data Frame to Factors

gbif_records()

Download Records of Species from GBIF

hierarchy()

Determine species hierarchy

isolation()

Calculate the Isolation Metrics

is_less()

Identify Values that are Less than Previous Value

node_clades()

Descendant Species of Nodes

not_all_NA()

Evaluate Vector Emptiness

plot_est()

Create Model Estimates Plot

plot_est_age()

Create Model Estimates ~ Clade Age Plots

PSV_geo()

Calculate the PSV for geographic features

psv_LM()

Create a list of PSV linear models

rec_update()

Filter Out New GBIF Occurrence Records

row_max()

Find the Maximum Value of a Row

row_min()

Find the Minimum Value of a Row

r_squared()

Calculate R Squared for Averaged Model(s)

SR_geo()

Calculate SR for geographic features

sr_LM()

Create a list of SR linear models

stndrd()

Standardize Columns of a Data Frame
